name: Jump Granny, Jump
description:
Can your Granny Jump?

A flock of pigeons is closing in on your granny! Help her scare them away in this new, challenging, free casual game. Press and hold the screen to make your grandma jump and land to make the pigeons fly away. But don’t take too long to jump, or the pigeons will get too close for comfort.

Fun casual game features:
- Fast and easy, yet challenging gameplay makes this a casual game for everyone!
- Advance through hundreds of free game levels.
- Colorful animation and smooth gameplay mechanics for a perfect casual gaming experience.
- A challenging game that’s completely FREE to play!

It’s time to save your granny and make her jump! Download and play for free now!
